siteTitle: Yakup Delil Akın | Software Developer & Designer
hero-description: I'm Yakup Delil Akın. I blend aesthetics with high-performance code to craft unforgettable digital experiences for brands.
athleticocore-description: A real-time computer vision system that runs entirely in the browser, analyzes push-up form using camera input, counts repetitions, and generates performance metrics.
athleticocore-challenge-1: Maintaining real-time 25+ FPS on low-mid range devices
athleticocore-challenge-2: Accurate angle calculation across different body types and lighting
athleticocore-challenge-3: Browser camera permissions and privacy compliance
athleticocore-system-1: Camera input is captured via WebRTC.
athleticocore-system-2: Joint landmarks are extracted using MediaPipe Pose.
athleticocore-system-3: Angles and motion data are calculated in real time.
athleticocore-system-4: Instant feedback is provided when form degrades.
athleticocore-system-5: Analysis intensity is reduced automatically when FPS drops.
athleticocore-tech-1: All analysis runs fully client-side to minimize latency.
athleticocore-tech-2: Inference frequency is reduced when FPS drops below 20.
athleticocore-tech-3: Resolution is automatically optimized for mobile devices.
athleticocore-tech-4: No camera data is sent to external servers.
athleticocore-result-2: Over 83% form detection accuracy on test sets.
